description: A Model Context Protocol server that enables Claude Desktop to generate images using Baidu's iRAG image generation API through a standardized interface.

MODEL.description: Default model to use: irag-1.0 or flux.1-schnell

BASE_PATH.description: Custom save path for images (optional, defaults to desktop/irag-images)

MAX_RETRIES.description: Maximum number of API call retries

RESOURCE_MODE.description: Image resource mode: 'local' to save files locally, 'url' to only return URL and base64

name: iRAG MCP Server
